bike.description: Gold Series 6061 T6 aluminum, G2 Geometry, butted DT, cold-forged dropouts & BB

components.description: RockShox Tora SL Coil, 100mm Travel, Custom Fisher Genesis 2 Geometry 46mm offset crown, Coil Spring w/ Turnkey Lockout, External Preload and Rebound Adjustment, Magnesium Lowers, International Standard Disc Mount
Shimano M495 CenterLock disc hubs, Bontrager Ranger disc rims, 32h
Bontrager Jones XR, 2.2 rear/2.25 front, wire bead
Bontrager SSR riser, 25mm rise, 620mm width, 6d backsweep
Shimano M486, hydraulic disc, 160mm CenterLock rotors
Bontrager QR seatbinder, chainstay protector, reflectors, Limited Lifetime Warranty
